title: Serene Jodhpur Escape with Daily Breakfast and Nightly Dinner
description: Experience the magic of the Blue City staying in the calming oasis of WelcomHotel Jodhpur, a member of ITC Hotels. Located on the edge of the Thar desert, surrounded by nature, you will love the hotel's tranquility, its stunning outdoor pool and restaurant serving cuisine from around the world. Make the most of your escape with daily buffet breakfast, a three-course dinner each night, a resort credit to use on whatever you wish and a 20% discount on food, drinks and spa treatments. Packages are valid for two adults and two children with upgrades available.
offer_address: 53, Uchiyarda road, Near Euro International School, Jodhpur - 342027,  Rajasthan,India

title: Grand Jodhpur Desert Stay with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description:
A desert oasis on the edge of one of the world's most breathtaking cities, the mesmerising 'Blue City', Welcomhotel Jodhpur is a shimmering mirage of grand palatial architecture, world-class amenities and 10 acres of perfectly manicured gardens. Located on the outskirts of the awe-inspiring Thar Desert, just 10 hours from Delhi and less than eight hours from Ahmedabad, this breathtaking hotel - brought to you by the world-renowned ITC Hotels collection - is the perfect place to revitalise and reinvigorate.

While your days away by the luxurious pool, discover the onsite spa and venture into the heart of Jodhpur, where the imposing silhouette of Mehrangarh is visible from most parts of the old city and the Umaid Bhawan Palace beckons.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Start each day with a lavish breakfast buffet at WelcomCafe Chinkara
- End every night with a delicious buffet dinner at WelcomCafe Chinkara
- Enjoy a soft drink on arrival each to welcome you in style
- Make the most of your stay with a 20% discount on drinks, dining, spa and laundry
- Stay connected with complimentary Wi-Fi included throughout your stay

**Travelling with family?** One child (10 and under) or two infants (six and under) stay free on existing bedding with all inclusions - or upgrade to the Two-Bedroom Pool Villa, valid for up to four adults and one child (10 and under) or four infants (6 and under).
offer_address: 53, Uchiyarda Road, Near Euro International School, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342027

vendor_name: The Ummed Jodhpur Palace Resort and Spa

A palatial symbol of Rajasthan heritage perched on the edge of the majestic Thar Desert, this luxury resort is located less than 30 minutes from Jodhpur Airport and is just an 11-hour drive from Delhi. Embark on a once-in-a-lifetime Sun City discovery at this grand desert oasis that promises royal luxury, heart-warming hospitality and contemporary facilities.
location_description: The Ummed Jodhpur Palace Resort and Spa

title: Lavish Boutique Escape in Jodhpur with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Blackbuck Safari
description:
Rohet Garh is a heritage property that has stood the test of time. Less than an hour from the beautiful city of Jodhpur, it's an ancestral home turned boutique hotel that offers a quiet escape amid rural surroundings on the banks of a lake. The property is a true reflection of its legacy, an amalgamation of world-class hospitality and redefined elegance. With regal rooms that exude traditional nuances, an enticing swimming pool and pleasing views to make your stay unforgettable - this is a wonderful escape.

Accessible from major metro cities like Delhi, Jaipur and Ahmedabad, Rohet Garh could easily become your next weekend destination. Here you'll find traditional cuisine served with utmost finesse, jeep safaris to give you a taste of adventure, authentic Rajasthani folk entertainment to introduce you to the local culture, and a cycling tour of the village. Ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, this ancestral royal home has hosted many celebrated personalities of the literary world such as Bruce Chatwin and William Dalrymple who brought their books to life in this very same hotel.
offer_address: Rohet Garh, P.O. Rohet Pali, Rajasthan, India 306401

title: Experience India's First Heritage Hotel in the Heart of Jodhpur
description: Holiday like a maharaja at India’s first heritage hotel: the palatial Ajit Bhawan. Before being reimagined as India's first heritage hotel, this iconic building was once home to the former Maharaja's younger brother, Major General Maharaj Dhiraj Sir Ajit Singh Ji. Your ultra-luxe escape includes daily buffet breakfast, a sumptuous three-course dinner, private return airport transfers, spa and food discounts, and a welcome refreshment on arrival.
offer_address: Circuit House Road, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342006, India

title: India's First Heritage Hotel in the Heart of Jodhpur Escape with Sightseeing Tour, Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Holiday like a Maharaja at India’s first heritage hotel - the palatial Ajit Bhawan, located in the heart of Jodhpur. Before being reimagined as India's first heritage hotel, this iconic building was once home to the former Maharaja's younger brother. Resting on the edge of the Thar Desert, this regal edifice is approximately 11 hours from Delhi by car. Luxury tents, stylish rooms and suites welcome you with open arms to experience a stay steeped in history. The hotel boasts a long list of five-star facilities to help make your stay in this exclusive haven unforgettable: indulge in various sumptuous cuisines at the hotel's restaurants, work out at the fully equipped gym and enjoy revitalising treatments at the onsite spa.

If you’re looking to make the most of your stay, be sure to visit Umaid Bhawan Palace. Featuring a combination of Indian and European-style architecture, this massive 347-room palace is one of the largest private residences in the world. For something a little different, explore the magnificent Mandore Gardens to admire the scenic grounds.
offer_address: Circuit House Road, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342006, India

title: Luxe Jodhpur Heritage Stay with Daily Dining & Local Experience
description:
Sitting pretty on the banks of a lake amid a rural heartland just outside Jodhpur is Rohet Garh, a 375-year-old boutique resort. Experience a relaxing escape in this heritage property, a tranquil oasis that has hosted celebrity guests including Madonna.

Make the most of this incredible stay with daily breakfast, daily three-course dinner, one local experience (village safari or cycling tour with birdwatching) per stay, and complimentary Wi-Fi.

**Travelling with family?** Two kids (aged four years and under) stay free with all inclusions, sleeping in existing bedding.
offer_address: Rohet Garh, P.O. Rohet Pali, Rajasthan, India 306401

title: Royal Jodhpur Radisson Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Drinks
description:
Enjoy a royal retreat at Radisson Jodhpur, an all-vegetarian resort ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor, and just minutes from the popular attractions of Jodhpur.

This architectural marvel with forts and palaces constructed by the royal architects is spread across 70,000sqft of stunning landscape and the perfect gateway to Sun City. Carved out of red sandstone, this spectacular resort resembles a Rajasthani haveli, with the convenience of contemporary luxuries. Enjoy a stress-free escape from everyday life, just a 10-hour drive from Delhi and an eight-hour drive from Ahmedabad. Once here, treat yourself to Indian and western delicacies at one of two restaurants, enjoy a drink at one of two elegant bars, take a dip in the beautiful swimming pool, or, for the ultimate in relaxation, head to SVA Spa.
offer_address: Gaurav Path, 8, Residency Rd, Air Force Area, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342001

title: Boutique Jodhpur Suite Luxury with Daily Breakfast, Daily Dinner & Private Roundtrip Airport Transfers
description:
Escape to boutique luxury in Jodhpur at The Rohet House - sister property of the renowned Mihir Garh and Rohet Garh - located a nine-hour drive from Delhi. Spread lavishly across 14,000 square feet, this former family home has been turned into a spectacular hotel. On your holiday, you get to stay in the ultra-luxurious suite, float in a magnificent swimming pool, dine in a tastefully designed dining room, while time away in enticing lounges and verandas and meander in verdant gardens. The hotel also features a beautiful herb garden from which guests can choose their favourite herb to be added to their meal.

Jodhpur is brimming with delights, most notably the famed Mehrangarh Fort and museum, and these well-preserved heritage structures are not to be missed. Adrenaline junkies can go zip-lining on the Jodhpur Flying Fox, while the newly restored Toorji ka Jhalra is an ancient stepwell that has been redeveloped to offer cool cafés and stores.
offer_address: PWD Rd, opposite Dilip Garden, P.W.D Colony, Jodhpur, Rajasthan 342001, India Compare prices
